hiveArticle.title: Cat Posing to be Clicked
hiveArticle.body:
I was on the balcony where I spotted a Cat, luckily she sees me too. She was climbing a tree, don't know why though. On seeing me she stopped and started giving poses as you can see. Bdw she was a cute little cat but I guess her intention was to eat the bird's kid, when she saw me she came down thinking I will prevent her from climbing. 

So here are the Poses of Caty :P

### Pose : 1 - Closer look

![IMG_20180217_113631.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUib3QAczMLyUHuFLMUMkuEcWCd6T3Gzi2Q1sJSDpeaZ7/IMG_20180217_113631.jpg)

<hr>

### Pose : 2 - From a distance

![IMG_20180217_113620.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmU8v18ty37iKE2LSC49URPHKu7yT5dfLUhMzqP9TpzFGb/IMG_20180217_113620.jpg)

<hr>

### Pose : 3 - A little further distance

![IMG_20180217_113657.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZvCBzv1a2xrGoLcDB4GNoragDYJmRS4WK1m4hYR1XLu8/IMG_20180217_113657.jpg)

<hr>

### Pose 4 : Hide and Seek 

![IMG_20180217_113705.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRUiHfJAc63LwTuoaALPRtfMKNhLwA9TwU1L8Mnsy624F/IMG_20180217_113705.jpg)

### Camera : Nokia 6
